name: AnimusHome
0:
”Alexa, open animus heart”
”turn off the lights”
”what is the temperature”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animus heart
des:
This skill enables you to control all your smart home appliances that are connected to your Animus Heart. 

You need to register one account on Animus Home cloud server
https://www.animushome.com/en/users/sign_up
